PlayerBasicAttack.Name: PlayerBasicAttack
PlayerBasicAttack.Narrative: swings their weapon with basic skill.

ShadowPierce.Name: ShadowPierce
ShadowPierce.Narrative: unleashes a piercing strike from the shadows.

InfernoBlast.Name: InfernoBlast
InfernoBlast.Narrative: conjures a massive ball of fire.

Crystalize.Name: Crystalize
Crystalize.Narrative: encases the foe in crystalline bonds.

WhirlwindSlash.Name: WhirlwindSlash
WhirlwindSlash.Narrative: executes a spinning attack, hitting all nearby.

EarthquakeStomp.Name: EarthquakeStomp
EarthquakeStomp.Narrative: slams the ground, causing a violent quake.

MysticBind.Name: MysticBind
MysticBind.Narrative: casts ancient runes to immobilize the target.

IceSpear.Name: IceSpear
IceSpear.Narrative: hurls a spear of ice, chilling to the bone.
